column4: can someone please help a linux noob get wine 1.1.21 working in ubuntu 9.04 with intent to install office 2007?  It doesn't show up in synaptic, and I've downloaded the tar.bz2 file
sudo apt-get update, sudo apt-get install wine winedoors?
I ran the commands u gave me im getting E: Couldn't find package winedoors
also, after updating synaptec still only shows wine 1.0.1
